name: Tetris Factory (zjliuzj, Mingyue)
description:
#Easy to play, hard to be good

#Back to the future

Inspired by the given topic, we choose Tetris as the main product for this game.

Tetris Factory is aimed to be a rogue-like business simulation game.

Theme

In a world full of Tetris fanatics, people are willing to pay for Tetris products. 

As a talented carver, you set up a factory to create Tetris products.

Challenges and rewards coexist in the process of running the factory. It is easy to set up, hard to insist on.

How To Play ? 

A, D    -->  Move the belt

Space  -->  Rotate the block & Stamp

S          -->  Speed up falling

Use mouse to select Stamps and Resume button. (Right corner)
